sentences.en: a gradual change in the climate
A major change of political climate is not in prospect.
sentences.cn: 暂时还看不出政治面貌有可能发生巨变。

sentences.en: Climate reflects a basic struggle between constancy and change.
sentences.cn: 气候反映出稳定与变化之间基本的较量。

sentences.en: Few businesses are flourishing in the present economic climate.
sentences.cn: 在目前的经济气候下，很少有企业兴旺发达。

sentences.en: If climate changes continue, we will suffer the consequences.
sentences.cn: 如果气候变化继续下去，我们将自食其果。

sentences.en: In the present climate, owners are hanging on to old ships.
sentences.cn: 在目前的形势下，船东们都不愿淘汰掉旧船。

sentences.en: In this economic climate new ideas were few and far between.
sentences.cn: 在这种经济环境下，新想法极为罕见。
洛杉矶温暖干燥的气候

sentences.en: Shelley was advised that the Italian climate would rejuvenate him.
sentences.cn: 有人建议雪莱去意大利，那里的天气会使他恢复活力。

sentences.en: Small businesses are finding it hard to survive in the present economic climate.
sentences.cn: 小企业感到在当前的经济形势下很难生存。

sentences.en: The climate has grown more equable and the crop yields have risen.
sentences.cn: 天气变得更加温和，粮食产量也已经提高。

sentences.en: The famine turned the normal modulation of climate into disaster.
sentences.cn: 正常的气候变化因饥荒而成了灾难。

sentences.en: The harshness of the climate makes vegetative growth extremely slow.
sentences.cn: 恶劣的气候使植物生长特别缓慢。

sentences.en: The town's political climate was libertarian.
sentences.cn: 该镇的自由主义政治气氛浓厚。

sentences.en: These flowers will not grow in cold climates.
sentences.cn: 这些花在气候寒冷的地方无法生长。

sentences.en: They enjoyed an especially benign climate.
sentences.cn: 他们那里的气候非常宜人。

sentences.en: What a damnable climate we have!
sentences.cn: 我们这的气候真是糟糕透顶！

sentences.en: When the political climate tilted towards fundamentalism he was threatened.
sentences.cn: 当政治气候倾向于原教旨主义时，他受到了威胁。
